alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 4:38AM MST until December 26 at 4:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Utah, Southeast Utah, Arches/Grand Flat and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin, Grand Valley, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin and Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 4 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects such as Holiday ornaments. Smaller tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers are also possible in many areas and the wind could cause areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River
